home.title: Sakura Cafe
home.subtitle: Unique Dining Experience
home.description: Discover the most beautiful flavors of coffee and Eastern and Arabic cuisine in a calm and comfortable atmosphere

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: About Us
about.identityText: We are Sakura Cafe, an influential, innovative and progressive institution, we seek to reinvent the concept of classic coffee and traditional bakeries. We believe that every cup of coffee should be a unique and distinctive experience.
about.missionText: We provide an ideal customer experience with the highest quality standards, in a calm and comfortable atmosphere that helps you relax and achieve your goals. Every product we offer carries the mark of excellence and creativity.
about.growthText: We are in continuous growth! We recently opened our new branch "Falak Sakura", and we plan to expand our presence throughout the Kingdom to provide our unique experience to all coffee lovers.
about.excellenceText: We always strive to provide the best quality in every product and service
about.innovationText: We innovate new flavors and develop unique experiences for our customers
about.careText: We put our customers' comfort and happiness first

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: Our Menu
menu.description: Discover the most beautiful flavors of coffee and Eastern and Western cuisine

branches.title: Our Branches
branches.subtitle: Our Branches
branches.description: We provide our services in 6 branches spread across different neighborhoods of Hail, each branch is designed to provide you with a unique and comfortable experience
branches.mapDescription: Use the map to find the nearest branch to you

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Contact Us
contact.description: We are here to answer your inquiries and receive your feedback. Do not hesitate to contact us in any way you prefer
contact.subject: Subject
